name: 1 Deck Mayhem
description:
A small prototype made for the gmtk game jam 2019.

The idea was to make this a card game like magic or hearthstone, but where you draw from the same deck/discard!

I think there is potential for some really weird interactions with this idea, but didn't quite have enough time to get that far.

I bit off more then I can chew.  Unfortunately its pretty bare bones.

But it was still a fun jam!  And I learned a lot!

( enjoy :) )
